Não tem como não recomendar esse jogo. Um clássico que revolucionou a indústria dos games, de novo. Após incluir os portais em um engine no Portal, a Valve nos surpreendeu com um modo de jogo cooperativo muito divertido.

Perhaps the most unique, well-crafted first person puzzle game of all time. 

The concept of "portal here comes out this portal there" never gets old. The developers are constantly giving you new tools to play with or putting a new spin on a concept you've already learned in the puzzles. Valve really outdid themselves with this sequel to the original Portal. the single player story and puzzles are one of a kind. Cooperative play is such a blast to play with friends either split screen or online. These co-op puzzles also open up a whole new dimension of possibilities. Not to mention the post launch content that was added in the form of Steam Workshop support. This allows anyone who owns the game to create their own puzzles and levels within Portal 2 for co-op or single player right from the game itself without needing to learn any modding or mapping software. This makes for literally endless user submitted levels. You will literally never run out of levels to play. This is also why we may never get a Portal 3 because Valve just nailed everything about this game. Sad, but good for this game.

In addition, because it's Valve and the original Source engine (and the game itself is quite a few years old now) it will run on almost any computer. Portal 2 is one of the best optimized games for low spec computers you can find on steam. With a few tweaks it can run smoothly even if your computer is very old or under powered. 

I previously owned the game and played through it entirely on the Xbox 360 and enjoyed it even then. That said, re-buying on steam was so, so worth it, just for the online coop and steam workshop support. Easily recommended even at full price, but if you're even slightly patient and wait for a sale, you can pick it up for a few bucks or less. And because it's Valve's game there are no shortage of times in the year when it's on sale.

Absolute must buy to anyone on Steam. I would recommend to anyone. This is a legendary game from Valve you MUST play some time in your life.
